title: Ballad of Lucy Jordan
brief_description: Animated adaptation of the song by Dr. Hook, using mainly photographic stills to tell the sad and ironic tale of a thirty seven year old house wife whose daydreams lead only to despair.
description: Animated adaptation of the song by Dr. Hook, using mainly photographic stills to tell the sad and ironic tale of a thirty seven year old house wife whose daydreams lead only to despair.
